name: cms-clone-deep
description: A dependency-free utility for deeply cloning JavaScript objects.

scripts.tsc: node -e "console.log('Transpiling codebase; result will be in tsdist directory')" && npx tsc && npm run delete-tsdist
scripts.verify-project: node -e "console.log('Running test suite:')" && npm test && npm run tsc && node -e "console.log('\n\nRunning linter:')" &&npm run lint

author: Caleb Sword
